CustomField.description: This formula checks if all required fields are populated and if a mid-implementation communication hasn't been sent. If the project is 'Core' and it's the 45th day after the start date, or if it's 'Select' or 'Strategic' and it's the 90th day after the start date, it returns 'Send Check-In Email'; otherwise, it returns blank
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Point_of_Contact_txt__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_POC_Email_Address__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(IC_Manager_Email__c)), NOT(Mid_Imp_CI_Email_Sent__c), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Project_Level__c, "Core"), TODAY() == (pse__Start_Date__c + 45) ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project_Level__c, "Select"), ISPICKVAL(Project_Level__c, "Strategic") ), TODAY() == (pse__Start_Date__c + 90) ) ) ), "Send Check-In Email", "" )
CustomField.label: Send Check-In email
